body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, pilot. Hardin County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Richardson. Father of Albert Richardson, Medora Richardson, Alonza Richardson, Mary Richardson, William Richardson, and Carrie Richardson. Pilot in Louisville in 1860.
